ai-tha-ap75:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap75:2.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap75:3.3_0: looks all around the four directions,
ai-tha-ap75:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap75:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap75:6.1_0: with wisdom, the most senior monk who was ready.
